faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Common questions about our custom software development services
faq.question1: How long does a typical project take?
faq.answer1: Project timelines vary depending on complexity and requirements. Simple web applications typically take 2-4 months, while complex enterprise solutions can take 6-12 months. We provide detailed project timelines during our initial consultation.
faq.question2: What technologies do you work with?
faq.answer2: We work with modern technologies including React, Next.js, Node.js, Python, TypeScript, and various databases. We choose the best technology stack based on your specific requirements and business needs.
faq.answer3: Yes, we offer comprehensive support and maintenance services including bug fixes, updates, feature enhancements, and technical support. We have flexible support packages to meet your needs.
faq.question4: How do you ensure project quality?
faq.answer4: We follow industry best practices including code reviews, automated testing, continuous integration, and regular client feedback sessions. Our quality assurance process ensures reliable and maintainable software.
